name: FLIGHT SCHOOL INTERNATIONAL INC
about: Flight School International Inc. is a premier aviation training institution, dedicated to providing top-notch flight training to aspiring pilots worldwide. With a rich history spanning over several decades, our school has a reputation for producing highly competent and safe aviators. Our faculty includes experienced airline pilots who bring real-world expertise to the classroom and flight simulators. We offer a comprehensive range of courses, including Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot, and Flight Instructor Training, all exceeding FAA standards. Located in a region with favorable flying weather, our students benefit from over 350 days of flying per year. Our commitment to safety, personalized training, and career development ensures that our graduates are well-prepared for successful careers in aviation. Join us for a professional and rewarding flight training experience.
